info.name: HS-Coburg Web Outlook Dark Theme
info.description: A dark theme for HS-Coburg web outlook
info.additionalInfo:
Also available as Firefox Plugin: Dark HS-Co Outlook Changelog: Version 1.51.2: date 2022-11-07
  • Fix appointment text color
  • Padding for mail conent
Changelog: Version 1.51.1: date 2022-06-13 Calendar View fixes
  • Fixed sidebars text color to be readable
  • Text color of calendar view now white to be more readable
  • Changed background color of right sidebar
Version 1.51.0: date 2021-11-02
  • Fixed style of reply mail viewer
